Title: Requires a certified dietitian on-site during hours of operation at a comprehensive care center for eating disorders
Summary: Requires a certified dietitian, pursuant to the education law, on-site during hours of operation in order to apply as a comprehensive care center for eating disorders.
LawCode: Amd ยง2799-g, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to requiring a certified dietitian on-site during hours of operation at a comprehensive care center for eating disorders
